features.land: '1' if packet[IP].src == packet[IP].dst and packet[TCP].sport == packet[TCP].dport else '0'
features.wrong_fragment: packet[IP].frag if IP in packet else 'NA'
features.urgent: packet[TCP].urgptr if TCP in packet else 'NA'
features.hot: '1' if Raw in packet and b'hot' in packet[Raw].load else '0'
features.num_failed_logins: '1' if Raw in packet and b'failed login' in packet[Raw].load else '0'
features.logged_in: '1' if Raw in packet and b'successful login' in packet[Raw].load else '0'
features.num_compromised: '1' if Raw in packet and b'compromised' in packet[Raw].load else '0'
features.root_shell: '1' if Raw in packet and b'root shell' in packet[Raw].load else '0'
features.su_attempted: '1' if Raw in packet and b'su root' in packet[Raw].load else '0'
features.num_root: '1' if Raw in packet and b'root access' in packet[Raw].load else '0'
features.num_file_creations: '1' if Raw in packet and b'file creation' in packet[Raw].load else '0'
features.num_shells: '1' if Raw in packet and b'shell prompt' in packet[Raw].load else '0'
features.num_access_files: '1' if Raw in packet and b'access file' in packet[Raw].load else '0'
features.num_outbound_cmds: '1' if Raw in packet and b'outbound command' in packet[Raw].load else '0'
features.is_host_login: '1' if Raw in packet and b'host login' in packet[Raw].load else '0'
features.is_guest_login: '1' if Raw in packet and b'guest login' in packet[Raw].load else '0'
features.count: '1' if Raw in packet and b'count' in packet[Raw].load else '0'
features.srv_count: '1' if Raw in packet and b'srv_count' in packet[Raw].load else '0'
features.serror_rate: '1' if Raw in packet and b'serror_rate' in packet[Raw].load else '0'
features.srv_serror_rate: '1' if Raw in packet and b'srv_serror_rate' in packet[Raw].load else '0'
features.rerror_rate: '1' if Raw in packet and b'rerror_rate' in packet[Raw].load else '0'
features.srv_rerror_rate: '1' if Raw in packet and b'srv_rerror_rate' in packet[Raw].load else '0'
features.same_srv_rate: '1' if Raw in packet and b'same_srv_rate' in packet[Raw].load else '0'
features.diff_srv_rate: '1' if Raw in packet and b'diff_srv_rate' in packet[Raw].load else '0'
features.srv_diff_host_rate: '1' if Raw in packet and b'srv_diff_host_rate' in packet[Raw].load else '0'
features.dst_host_count: '1' if Raw in packet and b'dst_host_count' in packet[Raw].load else '0'
features.dst_host_srv_count: '1' if Raw in packet and b'dst_host_srv_count' in packet[Raw].load else '0'
features.dst_host_same_srv_rate: '1' if Raw in packet and b'dst_host_same_srv_rate' in packet[Raw].load else '0'
features.dst_host_diff_srv_rate: '1' if Raw in packet and b'dst_host_diff_srv_rate' in packet[Raw].load else '0'
features.dst_host_same_src_port_rate: '1' if Raw in packet and b'dst_host_same_src_port_rate' in packet[Raw].load else '0'
features.dst_host_srv_diff_host_rate: '1' if Raw in packet and b'dst_host_srv_diff_host_rate' in packet[Raw].load else '0'
features.dst_host_serror_rate: '1' if Raw in packet and b'dst_host_serror_rate' in packet[Raw].load else '0'
features.dst_host_srv_serror_rate: '1' if Raw in packet and b'dst_host_srv_serror_rate' in packet[Raw].load else '0'
features.dst_host_rerror_rate: '1' if Raw in packet and b'dst_host_rerror_rate' in packet[Raw].load else '0'
features.dst_host_srv_rerror_rate: '1' if Raw in packet and b'dst_host_srv_rerror_rate' in packet[Raw].load else '0'
